data.oai_dc:dc: Locations and genotypes scored in Nigritella miniata sampled at Sennes (Dolomites, South Tyrol, Italy).

Locations and genotypes scored in Nigritella miniata sampled at Sennes (Dolomites, South Tyrol, Italy). Data from other locatities in the Dolomites used as reference are also included. Columns Gc51-a through Gc77-d report simples sequence repeat (SSR) fragment sizes at loci Gc51 (first four columns) and Gc77 (last four columns). Nigritella miniata is a tetraploid species, and all four SSR fragments identified at a locus are usually of different size. Unique combinations of fragments are recognized as genotypes.
